mapper.select: SELECT ap.resno, ap.rdate, ap.mcode, ap.ano, ap.reg_date, ap.memo, ap.start_time, ap.rtime, ap.rstatus_bcd, ap.rstatus_mcd, ad.aname, pt.petno, pt.petname, pt.petbirth, pt.petweight, pt.petheight, mb.memno, mb.mname, cm1.content item, cm2.content status, cm3.content species, cm4.content gender FROM appointment ap JOIN admin ad ON ap.ano = ad.ano JOIN member mb ON ap.memno = mb.memno JOIN pet pt ON ap.petno = pt.petno JOIN medical_item mi ON ap.mcode = mi.mcode JOIN common cm1 ON mi.mtitle_bcd = cm1.bcd AND mi.mtitle_mcd = cm1.mcd JOIN common cm2 ON ap.rstatus_bcd = cm2.bcd AND ap.rstatus_mcd = cm2.mcd JOIN common cm3 ON pt.petspecies_bcd = cm3.bcd AND pt.petspecies_mcd = cm3.mcd JOIN common cm4 ON pt.petgender_bcd = cm4.bcd AND pt.petgender_mcd = cm4.mcd WHERE ap.resno = #{resno}
